TopicTitle: The Unofficial News About KSP Posted On Other Sites Thread!

Articles.Content:
> 
> I meant KSP's performance will be improved. That is; on all platforms. Better code, etc.

Improved would be an understatement. Those CPUs are [AMD's version of a 3-year-old Atom processor](http://www.anandtech.com/show/6972/xbox-one-hardware-compared-to-playstation-4/2), I can't see getting around some kind of hard part-count limit without a serious change in how part physics works.

> 
> Sony Online Entertainment?
> Hey, were you in the Star Wars Galaxies MMO?

Sony Online Entertainment, now Daybreak Games, isn't a bad group. The guys know what they're doing and I've been able to talk to a few of them several times. They're a good team, even if I don't agree with their decisions sometimes.

The discussion here is overlapping [other](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125659-Devnote-Tuesday-A-big-announcement) [threads](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125658-PS4-Announcement-Discussion). Please reserve this one for sharing news.
Here's a bit of meta-news: [Kowgan](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/120063-Kowgan) updated the delta-V map (originally by WAC) of the kerbolar system for 1.0.4:

KSP is coming to [the Wii U](http://www.nintendolife.com/news/2015/08/kerbal_space_program_is_landing_on_the_wii_u_eshop)... Discuss [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132694-KSP-is-coming-to-the-Wii-U).

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hNN1Zk_ss4g?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Also mentioned on [IGN](http://www.ign.com/articles/2015/08/27/kerbal-space-program-heading-to-wii-u), [Eurogamer](http://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2015-08-27-kerbal-space-program-set-to-land-on-wii-u) and [Destructoid](http://www.destructoid.com/kerbal-space-program-is-landing-on-wii-u-308042.phtml).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-27T10:02:16Z" title="08/27/2015 10:02  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 27, 2015</time> by Yakuzi**
  
needed proper embed job
KSP has officially been announced for the Wii U at PAX, ([Maxmaps](https://twitter.com/Maxmaps) shared this on his twitzoid page):

> 
> KSP has officially been announced for the Wii U at PAX, ([Maxmaps](https://twitter.com/Maxmaps) shared this on his twitzoid page):
> 
> Discuss [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132694-KSP-is-coming-to-the-Wii-U).
> 
> NB: Nintendo has made the video in the post above this one public again, seems someone at Nintendo Life jumped the gun yesterday.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/353-Kerbal-Space-Program-is-coming-to-Wii-U](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/353-Kerbal-Space-Program-is-coming-to-Wii-U) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Here's a bit of meta-news: [Kowgan](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/120063-Kowgan) updated the delta-V map (originally by WAC) of the kerbolar system for 1.0.4:
> 
> Discuss and/or say thanks in [the original thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96985-1-0-4-WAC-s-Delta-V-Map-continued-OPM-now-included-%28July-4th-2015%29)!

> 
> I have the same feeling in my stomach looking at this as standing at Hakata station trying to find my way to the Minamiya. What does the cat face mean?

I think it's a walrus face and it means that the kerbin<-->LKO figure (and ditto for anything with an atmosphere) is extremely speculative and should really read, "it depends".

*Reads having not really followed the 1.05 dev cycle and expecting it in a few days maybe* AFGHJJJDJGJDLSJGL HEEEEEEEEEEE!
Anyone have a link to the release artical on this forum that dosnt have the right hand side cut off?

> 
> Anyone have a link to the release artical on this forum that dosnt have the right hand side cut off?

Select all the text and copy/paste into your wordprocessor.

For anyone who missed it last Thursday (I know I did), Polygon posted a sneak peek of the KSP Xbox One version (discuss [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/132418-sneak-peek-at-xbox-one-version/)):

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gQVGSTWCjg4?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

Please pardon me for the bump, but I thought this twitter message was very much worth your attention. Have not seen this on the forums yet. Feel free to delete the post if this is not the correct place for discussion. Personally, I think this way of IVA view is fantastic!!

<iframe data-controller="core.front.core.autoSizeIframe" scrolling="no" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/?app=core&module=system&controller=embed&url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2FKerbalSpaceP%2Fstatus%2F707488162566840320" style="height:475px;"></iframe>

>

> 47 minutes ago, Jasper\_f said:
> 
> 
> Personally, I think this way of IVA view is fantastic!!
> 

Whoa... fantastic indeed. Did they mention this view mode in any of the dev diaries? I don't think they did, but it's an awesome feature!

> 
> 
> 9 hours ago, Jasper\_f said:
> 
> 
> Please pardon me for the bump, but I thought this twitter message was very much worth your attention. Have not seen this on the forums yet. Feel free to delete the post if this is not the correct place for discussion. Personally, I think this way of IVA view is fantastic!!
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe data-controller="core.front.core.autoSizeIframe" scrolling="no" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/?app=core&module=system&controller=embed&url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2FKerbalSpaceP%2Fstatus%2F707488162566840320" style="height:475px;"></iframe>
> 

This isn't news. No one has reported that this is a feature. It may have been mentioned by Das, but if so only those who watched him know. As far as anyone else knows this is Free IVA and Squad are once again, not just shooting themselves in the foot, but using a shotgun to mangle their entire lower leg by *tweeting* to a mass audience a series of screenshots of 1.1 that *heavily* imply to the average person, who doesn't know about Free IVA, that this is a stock feature, despite the fact that it has never been mentioned anywhere.

Unless it really is a new feature, which would be pretty crazy to show off via a few tiny screenshots with no other information. So I think either option makes the same amount of sense. Unfortunately there's no clear line of communication about this stuff to the community.

You can watch the whole Das stream here:

[https://www.twitch.tv/dasvaldez/v/53247671](https://www.twitch.tv/dasvaldez/v/53247671)

It's somewhere in that 10 hour video, I don't know where.

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, fourfa said:
> 
> 
> You can watch the whole Das stream here:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [https://www.twitch.tv/dasvaldez/v/53247671](https://www.twitch.tv/dasvaldez/v/53247671)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> It's somewhere in that 10 hour video, I don't know where.
> 

I searched for this specific bit in the stream. Screenshot sharing starts at 04:35:55. Das stated that he specifically asked Dr. Turkey for permission to share these 1.1 screenshots (slightly before the timestamp I posted). If I combine that with the tweet from Squad themselves, this leads me to believe this is indeed a stock 1.1 feature. If you draw any other conclusions from this, I'd be happy to hear them =).
